decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing mana ramp and control elements to establish a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent with powerful late-game plays. By ramping up mana with cards like Arboreal Grazer and Growth Spiral, the deck aims to quickly reach Field of the Dead to generate a horde of zombie tokens. Control elements such as Supreme Verdict and Teferi, Time Raveler help to disrupt the opponent's game plan while cards like Sphinx's Revelation provide additional card draw and life gain. The deck also features a few key threats like Hydroid Krasis to close out games.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using green creatures and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx, while also building up devotion to green for powerful card effects. The deck utilizes aggressive creatures like Burning-Tree Emissary and Voracious Hydra to apply pressure on the opponent, while also including removal options like Scavenging Ooze. Cards like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Vivien, Arkbow Ranger provide additional synergy and card advantage. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of fast mana generation and powerful green creatures.

The deck is focused on a fast and aggressive playstyle, aiming to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes low-cost creatures like Bloodsoaked Champion, Knight of the Ebon Legion, and Night Market Lookout to apply early pressure. It also features powerful creatures like Murderous Rider, Rankle, Master of Pranks, and Gutterbones to maintain a strong presence on the board. The deck incorporates disruption with cards like Thoughtseize to control the opponent's hand. It also includes efficient removal spells such as Fatal Push. The deck benefits from card draw and filtering with Smuggler's Copter. The mana base is strong and allows for consistent black mana production.

The focus of this deck is to establish board presence quickly with aggressive creatures and planeswalkers, while also having the ability to disrupt opponents with counterspells. The key strategy revolves around utilizing powerful creatures like Bonecrusher Giant, Questing Beast, and Glorybringer to deal damage efficiently, backed up by mana acceleration from cards like Llanowar Elves and Gilded Goose. The inclusion of planeswalkers like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Oko, Thief of Crowns adds versatility and additional threats to the deck. Overall, the deck aims to pressure opponents early and maintain tempo throughout the game.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures and disruption to control the board and overwhelm the opponent quickly. With a mixture of powerful creatures like Archangel Avacyn and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar, along with disruptive spells like Reflector Mage and Spell Queller, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent while also keeping their threats at bay. Using cards like Smuggler's Copter and Teferi, Time Raveler for card advantage and tempo plays, the deck aims to outmaneuver the opponent and secure a swift victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing green ramp strategies to quickly accelerate mana production and bring powerful spells into play. It aims to control the game through board wipes and counter spells, while also generating a constant stream of Zombie tokens with Field of the Dead. With cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Dovin's Veto providing additional control options, the deck can outlast opponents and overwhelm them with a combination of powerful creatures and card advantage. Additionally, the inclusion of Sphinx's Revelation allows for massive card draw and life gain, further solidifying its mid-to-late game dominance.

The main idea of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to quickly swarm the opponent with low-cost creatures and efficient removal spells. By applying early pressure with creatures like Bloodsoaked Champion, Knight of the Ebon Legion, and Scrapheap Scrounger, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, the deck aims to control the board and maintain momentum. Additionally, the inclusion of Rankle, Master of Pranks adds a versatile threat that can further disrupt the opponent's strategy. With a combination of aggression and disruption, this deck looks to secure a quick victory in the Pioneer 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and efficient mana ramp to quickly put pressure on the opponent. Cards like Steel Leaf Champion, Ghalta, Primal Hunger, and Lovestruck Beast provide powerful threats that can end the game quickly. The inclusion of cards like Oko, Thief of Crowns and Stubborn Denial help to protect your creatures and disrupt your opponent's game plan. With the combination of early aggression and disruptive elements, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using creatures like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves, while also building up devotion to green with cards like Burning-Tree Emissary and Nissa, Who Shakes the World. This allows for powerful plays with cards like Voracious Hydra and Walking Ballista, while also providing card advantage with Vivien, Arkbow Ranger and Jadelight Ranger. The inclusion of Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx further enhances the deck's ability to generate massive amounts of mana and overwhelm opponents with a fast, aggressive playstyle.

The main focus of this UW Control deck is to establish control over the game through powerful planeswalkers such as Teferi, Time Raveler and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells like Absorb and Syncopate. The deck also includes removal spells like Seal Away and Cast Out, along with card draw options like Narset, Parter of Veils and Dig Through Time. The mana base is designed to provide consistent access to both white and blue mana sources for casting spells efficiently.

The main focus of this deck is to use Wilderness Reclamation to generate mana while casting extra turn spells like Nexus of Fate. By creating recurring turns and utilizing cards like Tamiyo, Collector of Tales to draw and filter cards, the deck aims to control the board and prevent the opponent from taking actions through fog effects like Haze of Pollen. The deck's key strategy revolves around chaining extra turns together and overwhelming the opponent with card advantage and constant threats.

The deck focuses on using ramp spells and land-based synergies to quickly generate a large amount of mana and overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and creatures. By utilizing cards like Scapeshift and Field of the Dead, the deck aims to create multiple zombie tokens for defense and offense. Teferi, Time Raveler is used to control the opponent's spells and disrupt their game plan, while cards like Sphinx's Revelation and Supreme Verdict provide card advantage and board control. Ultimately, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through efficient ramping and control elements.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. By using cheap threats like Bloodsoaked Champion and Knight of the Ebon Legion, combined with disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, you can disrupt your opponent's game plan while building up your own board presence. Rankle, Master of Pranks provides additional disruption and card advantage, while cards like Smuggler's Copter and Castle Locthwain help maintain card advantage and keep the pressure on your opponent. The deck aims to close out games quickly by attacking relentlessly and efficiently using the resources at your disposal.

The key concept of this deck is to efficiently utilize powerful creatures and disruptive spells to continually pressure the opponent and drain their life total. By combining aggressive creatures like Knight of the Ebon Legion and Gifted Aetherborn with impactful cards like Gray Merchant of Asphodel and Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord, the deck aims to establish board presence and deplete the opponent's life points quickly. Additionally, the inclusion of hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and removal spells like Fatal Push and Cast Down allows the deck to maintain control of the game and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This Simic Aggro deck focuses on playing efficient creatures like Steel Leaf Champion and Lovestruck Beast, supported by mana accelerants like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves. The deck aims to quickly ramp into powerhouse creatures like Ghalta, Primal Hunger and overwhelm the opponent with big threats. Cards like Oko, Thief of Crowns provide disruption and card advantage, while Stubborn Denial protects your creatures from removal spells. The deck also includes versatile cards like Once Upon a Time to help find key pieces and maintain pressure on the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by countering opponent's spells, ramping up mana with Wilderness Reclamation, and using powerful card draw effects like Sphinx's Revelation to gain an advantage. The deck also includes board wipes like Supreme Verdict and Settle the Wreckage to control the board. Search for Azcanta helps to filter through the deck while Nexus of Fate provides extra turns to further solidify control. The deck aims to outvalue opponents and win through attrition and card advantage.

The main focus of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruption spells. By utilizing low-cost threats like Bloodsoaked Champion and Knight of the Ebon Legion, as well as versatile removal spells like Fatal Push and Murderous Rider, the deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Rankle, Master of Pranks. The inclusion of cards like Castle Locthwain and Mutavault provide additional utility and flexibility to the deck's strategy.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deploy cheap artifacts and creatures like Gingerbrute and Stonecoil Serpent, then power them up with Ensoul Artifact and Skilled Animator to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. It also runs disruption cards like Stubborn Denial to protect its threats, while using vehicles like Smuggler's Copter and Heart of Kiran to maintain a steady stream of threats on the board. Oko, Thief of Crowns provides additional versatility by turning opposing threats into Elk, while Gilded Goose helps ramp up mana for stronger plays.

The focus of this Pioneer Aggro Red Deck Wins deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. Cards like Legion Loyalist and Hanweir Garrison create a wide board presence, while cards like Glorybringer and Embercleave deal massive damage quickly. Chandra, Torch of Defiance also provides card advantage and additional burn spells. The deck aims to close out the game as quickly as possible by constantly applying pressure, using efficient creatures and removal spells to control the board and finish off the opponent.

The main focus of this Sultai Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan by utilizing a variety of removal spells like Fatal Push and Assassin's Trophy. It also aims to generate card advantage through cards like Treasure Cruise and Tamiyo, Collector of Tales. The deck includes powerful planeswalkers like Oko, Thief of Crowns and Liliana, the Last Hope to control the board and generate incremental advantages. With a mix of removal, card advantage, and powerful threats, this deck aims to outvalue and outlast its opponents in a game of attrition.
